00022 struct b2Color
00023 {
00024         b2Color() {}
00025         b2Color(float32 r, float32 g, float32 b) : r(r), g(g), b(b) {}
00026         void Set(float32 ri, float32 gi, float32 bi) { r = ri; g = gi; b = bi; }
00027         float32 r, g, b;
00028 };

00032 class b2Draw
00033 {
00034 public:
00035         b2Draw();
00036 
00037         virtual ~b2Draw() {}
00038 
00039         enum
00040         {
00041                 e_shapeBit                              = 0x0001,       
00042                 e_jointBit                              = 0x0002,       
00043                 e_aabbBit                               = 0x0004,       
00044                 e_pairBit                               = 0x0008,       
00045                 e_centerOfMassBit               = 0x0010        
00046         };
00047 
00049         void SetFlags(uint32 flags);
00050 
00052         uint32 GetFlags() const;
00053

00056 
00058         void ClearFlags(uint32 flags);
00059 
00061         virtual void DrawPolygon(const b2Vec2* vertices, int32 vertexCount, const b2Color& color) = 0;
00062 
00064         virtual void DrawSolidPolygon(const b2Vec2* vertices, int32 vertexCount, const b2Color& color) = 0;
00065 
00067         virtual void DrawCircle(const b2Vec2& center, float32 radius, const b2Color& color) = 0;
00068         
00070         virtual void DrawSolidCircle(const b2Vec2& center, float32 radius, const b2Vec2& axis, const b2Color& color) = 0;
00071         
00073         virtual void DrawSegment(const b2Vec2& p1, const b2Vec2& p2, const b2Color& color) = 0;
00074 
00077         virtual void DrawTransform(const b2Transform& xf) = 0;
